official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the control of vitiligo.

summary.text: National Vitiligo Control Act of 1981 - Amends title XI (Genetic Diseases, Hemophilia Programs, and Sudden Infant Death Syndrome) of the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish vitiligo information and education programs. Authorizes the Secretary to make grants and to enter into contracts for projects for: (1) research in the diagnosis and treatment of vitiligo; and (2) educational programs concerning such disease. Sets forth grant and contract application requirements. Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1982-1983. Requires the Secretary to submit a report to the President for transmittal to the Congress by February 1, 1982.
